title: Subsequence Fast-MCD
description: Implementation of https://doi.org/10.2307/1270566 with sliding windows as input

parameters.name: store_precision
parameters.description: Specify if the estimated precision is stored

parameters.name: support_fraction
parameters.description: The proportion of points to be included in the support of the raw MCD estimate. Default is None, which implies that the minimum value of support_fraction will be used within the algorithm: `(n_sample + n_features + 1) / 2`. The parameter must be in the range (0, 1).

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Determines the pseudo random number generator for shuffling the data.
